name: Does it Spark Joy?
description:
Does it spark joy in you? An introspective detective game

Well, it happened—you've been overwhelmed by your possessions. What you swore would never happen to you had now been exemplified by your apartment. It is time you decluttered.

Following the advise of organising consultant Marie Kondo, ask yourself:  Do I really use this item every day? Am I just keeping it around because I feel guilty throwing it out? 

Does this item spark joy in me?

[Press T to toss/donate/digitise an item | Press K to keep the item as it is | Press R to restart the game]
